      • transferFunds

        @Transactional(rollbackFor=java.lang.Exception.class,
               isolation=SERIALIZABLE)
public void transferFunds(com.unibet.worktest.bank.TransferRequest transferRequest)
                                                                                                                  throws com.unibet.worktest.bank.AccountNotFoundException,
                                                                                                                         com.unibet.worktest.bank.InsufficientFundsException,
                                                                                                                         com.unibet.worktest.bank.UnbalancedLegsException,
                                                                                                                         TransferFundException,
                                                                                                                         com.unibet.worktest.bank.InfrastructureException
        Description copied from interface: TransferService
        Executes a balanced, multi-legged monetary transaction as a single unit of work.
        Specified by:
        transferFunds in interface TransferService
        Parameters:
        transferRequest - a transfer request describing the transactions
        Throws:
        com.unibet.worktest.bank.AccountNotFoundException - if a referenced account does not exist
        com.unibet.worktest.bank.InsufficientFundsException - if a referenced account is overdrawn
        com.unibet.worktest.bank.UnbalancedLegsException - if the transaction legs are unbalanced (sum is not zero)
        TransferFundException
        com.unibet.worktest.bank.InfrastructureException
